pages.text: The second pillar of this modpack, and arguably the more important one, is the Create mod.$(br2)Create documentation explains the possibilities of the mod much better than this will, so it is recommended to review that for more detail.

pages.title: Energy
pages.text: Create hinges on the concept of energy, which is generated through various means. The simplest and easiest method of generating energy is rotation.$(br2)Rotation, especially in early development, will mostly come through either the hand crank or through water wheels connected to other machines via gearboxes, cogs, and shafts.

pages.title: Machines
pages.text: The main purpose of Create is to provide automation. This is achieved through machines.$(br2)The basic machines vital to Create automation include the mechanical press, the mechanical mixer, the mechanical drill, the mechanical saw, and the deployer.

These machines can be used alone to process and create new specialty items, but they work best in combination with another.$(br2)Some of the easiest mechanisms and best to prioritize early on include villagerless iron farms, automatic mining machines, and automatic harvesters.
